meanings.definition: Kitchenware made of thin metal, typically painted and decorated.
meanings.sent1: I bought a set of colorful toleware for my kitchen.
meanings.sent2: The toleware on the shelves added a charming touch to the room.
meanings.sent3: The toleware decided to have a party when the kitchen lights went out.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of toleware gleamed like a rainbow in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The toleware clattered noisily as it was stacked in the cupboard.

meanings.definition: The art or process of making decorative painted metalware.
meanings.sent1: She learned the intricate techniques of toleware painting.
meanings.sent2: The toleware artist carefully brushed on the final coat of paint.
meanings.sent3: The toleware competition was fierce, with each artist striving for perfection.
meanings.sent4: His skill in toleware was like watching a master painter at work.
meanings.sent5: The toleware workshop buzzed with creativity and inspiration.
